verses.verse: The Spirit<WH7307> of the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069> is upon me; because the LORD<WH3068> hath anointed<WH4886> me to preach good tidings<WH1319> unto the meek<WH6035>; he hath sent<WH7971> me to bind up<WH2280> the brokenhearted<WH7665> <WH3820>, to proclaim<WH7121> liberty<WH1865> to the captives<WH7617>, and the opening of the prison<WH6495> to them that are bound<WH631>;
To proclaim<WH7121> the acceptable<WH7522> year<WH8141> of the LORD<WH3068>, and the day<WH3117> of vengeance<WH5359> of our God<WH430>; to comfort<WH5162> all that mourn<WH57>;

To appoint<WH7760> unto them that mourn<WH57> in Zion<WH6726>, to give<WH5414> unto them beauty<WH6287> for ashes<WH665>, the oil<WH8081> of joy<WH8342> for mourning<WH60>, the garment<WH4594> of praise<WH8416> for the spirit<WH7307> of heaviness<WH3544>; that they might be called<WH7121> trees<WH352> of righteousness<WH6664>, the planting<WH4302> of the LORD<WH3068>, that he might be glorified<WH6286>.

And they shall build<WH1129> the old<WH5769> wastes<WH2723>, they shall raise up<WH6965> the former<WH7223> desolations<WH8074>, and they shall repair<WH2318> the waste<WH2721> cities<WH5892>, the desolations<WH8074> of many<WH1755> generations<WH1755>.
And strangers<WH2114> shall stand<WH5975> and feed<WH7462> your flocks<WH6629>, and the sons<WH1121> of the alien<WH5236> shall be your plowmen<WH406> and your vinedressers<WH3755>.

But ye shall be named<WH7121> the Priests<WH3548> of the LORD<WH3068>: men shall call<WH559> you the Ministers<WH8334> of our God<WH430>: ye shall eat<WH398> the riches<WH2428> of the Gentiles<WH1471>, and in their glory<WH3519> shall ye boast<WH3235> yourselves.

For your shame<WH1322> ye shall have double<WH4932>; and for confusion<WH3639> they shall rejoice<WH7442> in their portion<WH2506>: therefore in their land<WH776> they shall possess<WH3423> the double<WH4932>: everlasting<WH5769> joy<WH8057> shall be unto them.

For I the LORD<WH3068> love<WH157> judgment<WH4941>, I hate<WH8130> robbery<WH1498> for burnt offering<WH5930>; and I will direct<WH5414> their work<WH6468> in truth<WH571>, and I will make<WH3772> an everlasting<WH5769> covenant<WH1285> with them.

And their seed<WH2233> shall be known<WH3045> among the Gentiles<WH1471>, and their offspring<WH6631> among<WH8432> the people<WH5971>: all that see<WH7200> them shall acknowledge<WH5234> them, that they are the seed<WH2233> which the LORD<WH3068> hath blessed<WH1288>.

I will greatly<WH7797> rejoice<WH7797> in the LORD<WH3068>, my soul<WH5315> shall be joyful<WH1523> in my God<WH430>; for he hath clothed<WH3847> me with the garments<WH899> of salvation<WH3468>, he hath covered<WH3271> me with the robe<WH4598> of righteousness<WH6666>, as a bridegroom<WH2860> decketh<WH3547> himself with ornaments<WH6287>, and as a bride<WH3618> adorneth<WH5710> herself with her jewels<WH3627>. decketh: Heb. decketh as a priest

For as the earth<WH776> bringeth forth<WH3318> her bud<WH6780>, and as the garden<WH1593> causeth the things that are sown<WH2221> in it to spring forth<WH6779>; so the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069> will cause righteousness<WH6666> and praise<WH8416> to spring forth<WH6779> before all the nations<WH1471>.
